{% load i18n %} var toolbar_items = []; url_accueil = ''; var bouton_choixcarte = new Ext.Button({ id:'btnCarte', text:'Accueil', iconCls:'choixcarte', handler:function () { window.location = url_accueil; } }); var bouton_deconnexion = new Ext.Button({ id:'btnDisconnect', text:'{% trans "Disconnection" %}', handler:function () { window.location = ''; }, iconCls:'disconnect' }); var label_userinfo = new Ext.Toolbar.TextItem({ id:'lblusername', text:'{{user.username}}' }); toolbar_items.push('->', label_userinfo, '-', bouton_choixcarte, '-', bouton_deconnexion); geoc_ws='{{wsName}}';
